reviews.title: Good game....
reviews.comment: Good game with a couple of flaws. Firstly when I try to spin in the fish level as soon as I push the button the WHOLE game shuts down. Secondly it would be better if you could make it so that you can buy power ups with the coins in the game as not everyone wants to actually spend money on these games. Besides that the game is good and has a decent amount of payouts.
